sql-select.name: GetTablesWithoutAPrimaryKey
Tables without a primary key
sql-select.description: Find all tables without a primary key.
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSU.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[xtype] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[crdate] AS [ObjectCreateDate] FROM [dbo].[sysobjects] tSO INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysusers] tSU ON tSU.[uid] = tSO.[uid] LEFT OUTER JOIN [dbo].[sysindexes] tSIND ON tSIND.[id] = tSO.[id] AND tSIND.[indid] BETWEEN 1 AND 254 AND (tSIND.[status] & 0x20) = 0 -- Is hypothetical AND (tSIND.[status] & 0x40) = 0 -- Is only statistic AND (tSIND.[status] & 0x800) > 0 -- Is primary key WHERE tSO.[xtype] IN ( N'U' ) AND OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 AND tSIND.[id] IS NULL GROUP BY tSU.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSO.[xtype] ,tSO.[crdate] ORDER BY tSU.[name] ,tSO.[name] ;

SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSS.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[type_desc] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[create_date] AS [ObjectCreateDate] FROM [sys].[objects] tSO INNER JOIN [sys].[schemas] tSS ON tSS.[schema_id] = tSO.[schema_id] LEFT OUTER JOIN [sys].[indexes] tSIND ON tSIND.[object_id] = tSO.[object_id] AND tSIND.[is_primary_key] = 1 WHERE tSO.[type_desc] = N'USER_TABLE' AND OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[object_id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 AND tSIND.[object_id] IS NULL GROUP BY tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSO.[type_desc] ,tSO.[create_date] ORDER BY tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ;
